response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. This product, while valued at $1,200,000 to me, offers unparalleled benefits to its owner, estimated to be worth $800,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a premium price reflecting its exceptional value and the unique benefits it provides. I kindly request your consideration of $950,000 for this remarkable asset. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends in the long run, providing you with a competitive edge in your industry.", "product_price": 950000}
